{{Description|The most perilous place in the Mystic Onmyou Chamber. Even the greatest of wills will face a rending agony in this place... But this, too, is all inextricably part of reaching the pinnacle of martial prowess.}}

==Boss Quirks==
* Level 1: The Enemy Leader will have a great number of the following Attendants that will aid them in battle: Anemo Samachurls, Dendro Samachurls, Hilichurl Berserkers, and Pyro Hilichurl Shooters.
* Level 2: No Special Features

==Opposing Lineup==
All enemies in this challenge are Level 95.
